description1: Founded in 2025 by Lucas Ara√∫jo, QualiApps emerged from a real need at construction sites. The dream started with QualiObra, a gamified system where the AI "Quali" evaluates safety and quality through photos sent by workers.
description2: Using advanced AI tools to accelerate learning and development, we realized we could do more. Our mission today is clear: offer high-level systems and websites for small and medium businesses at a fair price, generating real engagement through technology.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: The culture that drives us every day.

faith.title: Faith in God
faith.description: Our non-negotiable foundation. We believe that work done with purpose, ethics, and gratitude bears fruit that goes beyond code.

truth.title: Truth
truth.description: Radical transparency with clients. No fine print. We deliver what we promise, with honesty about deadlines and costs.

design.title: Design
design.description: Functionality doesn't exist without beauty. We create interfaces that delight and provide a smooth, modern user experience.
